name: Dr. S. Selvakumar
title: General Consultant
bio: Dr. S. Selvakumar is an experienced general veterinary consultant providing comprehensive medical care for pets. With advanced training (MVSc), he focuses on accurate diagnosis, preventive healthcare, and long-term wellness management.

name: Dr. S. Sundararaj
title: General Consultant
bio: Dr. S. Sundararaj offers dedicated general veterinary services including routine check-ups, vaccinations, and primary medical care. His patient-focused approach ensures pets receive attentive and compassionate treatment.

name: Dr. T. S. Mukilarasu
title: General Consultant
bio: Dr. T. S. Mukilarasu provides essential veterinary consultation services, focusing on preventive medicine and routine healthcare for companion animals.

name: Dr. P. Tamilmahan
title: Expert Consultant
bio: Dr. P. Tamilmahan specializes in advanced surgical procedures and veterinary radiology. With doctoral-level expertise, he handles complex surgical cases and diagnostic imaging with precision and care.

name: Dr. M. Kesavan
title: Expert Consultant
bio: Dr. M. Kesavan is a specialist in veterinary internal medicine with international academic exposure from Stockholm, Sweden. He manages complex medical conditions with evidence-based treatment protocols.

name: Dr. M. Veeraselvam
title: Avian & Exotic Wing Specialist
bio: Dr. M. Veeraselvam specializes in the medical care of birds and exotic animals. His advanced academic training enables him to handle specialized diagnostic and treatment needs for non-traditional pets.

name: Dr. P. Mohanraj
title: Avian & Exotic Wing Specialist
bio: Dr. P. Mohanraj provides focused care for avian and exotic pets, offering consultation and treatment tailored to birds and other specialty species.
